医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现考虑性别可提高心力衰竭 CMR 生物标志物的精确度和预后性能研究人员调查了性别对心力衰竭（HF）诊断中左心室充盈压（LVFP）的心脏磁共振（CMR）评估的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-finds-accounting-for-sex-improves- precision-and-prognostic-performance-of-CMR-biomarkers-for-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-finds-accounting-for-sex-improves- precision-and-prognostic-performance-of-CMR-biomarkers-for-heart-failure.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af494145-2fab-4916-99dc-12d9f311fdba Fri, 17 May 2024 12:21:00 -0400 Study finds accounting for sex improves precision and prognostic performance of CMR biomarkers for heart failure
关于纽约大学朗格尼骨科医院的电影被选在第 23 届翠贝卡电影节上放映由纽约大学朗格尼骨科赞助的故事片《巨人的肩膀：纽约大学朗格尼骨科的历史》已被选为 2024 年翠贝卡 X 奖竞赛的官方选片，在第 23 届翠贝卡电影节上放映。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Film-about-NYU-Langone-Orthopedic-Hospital-chosen-to-screened-in-the-23rd-Tribeca-Festival.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Film-about-NYU-Langone-Orthopedic-Hospital-chosen-to-screened-in-the-23rd-Tribeca-Festival.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75a9ecd8-b68f-4288-a405-c7f458612e3b Fri, 17 May 2024 12:20:00 -0400 Film about NYU Langone Orthopedic Hospital chosen to be screened in the 23rd Tribeca Festival
使用二甲双胍可降低骨髓增生性肿瘤的风险根据《Blood Advances》发表的一项研究，随着时间的推移，使用二甲双胍的人患骨髓增生性肿瘤（MPN）的可能性较小，这表明这种治疗可能有助于预防某些类型癌症的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Metformin-use-linked-to-reduced-risk-of-myeloproliferative-neoplasms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Metformin-use-linked-to-reduced-risk-of-myeloproliferative-neoplasms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=214cf92c-05cf-44b6-92cb-b37597f6f1e7 Fri, 17 May 2024 12:14:00 -0400 Metformin use linked to reduced risk of myeloproliferative neoplasms
研究揭示生长受限胎儿的肺血管差异如果在怀孕期间胎儿的生长速度低于正常阈值，那么在怀孕的每一周，其某些器官可能无法正常发育的风险就会增加，这可能会对婴儿出生后的健康产生不利影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-reveals-lung-angio-differences-in-growth-restricted-fetuses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-reveals-lung-angio-differences-in-growth-restricted-fetuses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c0481a5-122e-41c7-ab87-0606e5f20583 Fri, 17 May 2024 12:06:00 -0400 Study reveals lung vascular differences in growth-restricted fetuses
浦项科技大学和ImmunoBiome在抗击癌症方面取得重大突破POSTECH和ImmunoBiome的团队在抗击癌症方面取得了重大突破。他们的研究发表在《自然免疫学》五月号（第 25 卷，第 790-801 页，2024 年）上，探索了一种源自饮食的细菌菌株 IMB001。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/POSTECH-and-ImmunoBiome-make-significant-breakthrough-in-the-fight-against-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/POSTECH-and-ImmunoBiome-make-significant-breakthrough-in-the-fight-against-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe12a38e-3382-4086-851b-1760d66f63c3 Fri, 17 May 2024 11:58:00 -0400 POSTECH and ImmunoBiome make significant breakthrough in the fight against cancer
澳大利亚国立大学研究人员开发新的人工智能工具，用于快速、准确的脑肿瘤分类澳大利亚国立大学 (ANU) 的研究人员开发了一种新的人工智能工具，可以更快速、更准确地对脑肿瘤进行分类。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/ANU-researchers-develop-new-AI-tool-for-rapid-accurate-brain-tumor-classification.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/ANU-researchers-develop-new-AI-tool-for-rapid-accurate-brain-tumor-classification.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea90f289-adcf-4e9c-b2ff-9162eaa737b8 Fri, 17 May 2024 11:50:00 -0400 ANU researchers develop new AI tool for rapid, accurate brain tumor classification
Twendee X 在减少系统性硬化症氧化应激方面表现出希望当身体的免疫系统攻击健康细胞而不是保护它们时，就会发生自身免疫性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Twendee-X-shows-promise-in-reducing-oxygen-stress-in-systemic-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Twendee-X-shows-promise-in-reducing-oxygen-stress-in-systemic-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae858dac-d8ea-429d-aeb2-c99392f488d3 Fri, 17 May 2024 11:43:00 -0400 Twendee X shows promise in reducing oxidative stress in systemic sclerosis
血液中的蛋白质可以在人们诊断癌症之前七年多向人们发出癌症警告英国研究人员利用观察和遗传学方法对英国生物银行的参与者调查了 1,463 种血浆蛋白与 19 种癌症之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Proteins-in-the-blood-could-warn-people-of-cancer-more-than-seven-years-before-it-is-diagnosed。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Proteins-in-the-blood-could-warn-people-of-cancer-more-than-seven-years-before-it-is-diagnosed。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2283578-c5e3-428e-8a3b-97812c7c805b Fri, 17 May 2024 11:36:00 -0400 Proteins in the blood could warn people of cancer more than seven years before it is diagnosed
UVA开发大数据工具来对抗儿童腹泻弗吉尼亚大学的研究人员正在开发一种灵活的在线工具，用于导航信息，通过识别传播热点并加速治疗和新疫苗的部署，来拯救儿童免受致命腹泻病的侵害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/UVA-develops-big-data-tool-to-combat-childhood-diarrea.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/UVA-develops-big-data-tool-to-combat-childhood-diarrea.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bdab4f2f-e539-4d98-b9a8-ba0d3ab5d184 Fri, 17 May 2024 11:35:00 -0400 UVA develops big data tool to combat childhood diarrhea
约翰霍普金斯大学的研究人员确定了先天性夜盲症背后的关键电活动约翰·霍普金斯大学医学院的神经科学家表示，他们已经使用基因工程小鼠来解决光敏蛋白视紫红质基因中的一个突变如何导致先天性静止性夜盲症，他们认为这是解决一个 30 年来的生物学谜团的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Johns-Hopkins-researchers-identify-key-electrical-activity-behind-congenital-night-blindness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Johns-Hopkins-researchers-identify-key-electrical-activity-behind-congenital-night-blindness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3601113b-f6a5-4630-838d-a7bbed2847c8 Fri, 17 May 2024 09:12:00 -0400 Johns Hopkins researchers identify key electrical activity behind congenital night blindness
